title: Drawing, Valley with McAllisters Saw Mill, Colombia, June 1853
title_raw: Valley with McAllisters Saw Mill, Colombia
medium:
Recto: Graphite, brush and oxidized white gouache on brown paper
Verso: Graphite on brown paper
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left:  Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center: Lugt 457d
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite, at bottom left: [an arrow between] W [and] N; and at bottom right: Mc Allisters saw mill - June 1853
Verso: Inscribed in graphite, at upper right: rock; and again: rock
description:
Recto: Horizontal oblique view of the watermill, shed, huts and grazing animals on a hillside in the foreground of a mountainous landscpe
Verso: At extreme right a horizontal view of a mountain range bordering a valley

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Valley with McAllisters Saw Mill, Colombia, June 1853. Recto: Graphite, brush and oxidized white gouache on brown paper
Verso: Graphite on brown paper. 
Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-64
